靬字的基本解释

靬
jiān
〔犂（
干皮革。l?）靬〕中国汉代西域国名，即大秦国。

靬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》居言切，平元，見。］
［《廣韻》苦旰切，去翰，溪。］
干革制成的“流马”部件。
[②]［kān］
［《廣韻》苦寒切，平寒，溪。］
(1)盛弓的袋子。
(2)箭袋。
[③]［hàn］
［《集韻》侯旰切，去翰，匣。］
同“釬1”。
臂铠。

靬字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　靬； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1385第05
【廣韻】【集韻】?居言切，音犍。【說文】乾革也。　又【說文】武威有麗靬縣。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?丘寒切，音看。義同。　又【集韻】弓衣也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?居閑切，音閒。【廣韻】黎靬，國名。在西域。【前漢·西域傳】以大鳥卵及黎靬眩人獻于漢。　又【集韻】渠焉切，音虔。驪靬，縣名。【前漢·地理志】張掖郡驪靬縣。【註】李奇曰：音遲虔。　又【唐韻】苦旰切【集韻】墟旰切，?音侃。【玉篇】盛矢器，著弓衣。　又【集韻】侯旰切，音翰。馬被具。

Basic explanation of words
Li
jiān
〔plow(
Dry leather. l?) The name of the Western Regions in the Han Dynasty in China, that is, the Great Qin Kingdom.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" Juyan cut, Pingyuan, see. ]
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, go to Han, Xi. ]
"Flowing horse" parts made of dry leather.
[②]［kān］
["Guangyun" bitter cold cut, Pinghan, Xi. ]
(1) The bag of Sheng Gong.
(2) Quiver.
[③]［hàn］
["Ji Yun" Hou Jiqie, go to Han, Xia. ]
Same as "Porcelain 1".
Vambraces.
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　靬; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1385 No. 05
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Juyan cut, sound Qiang. [Said Wen] Dry leather.　[Said Wen] There is Lilu County in Wuwei.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Qiu Hanqie, look at the sound. The same meaning.　[Ji Yun] Gong Yi also.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Living in leisure, sound in leisure. [Guang Yun] Li Li, the name of the country. In the Western Regions. [Previous Han · Western Regions Biography] Dedicated to Han with big bird eggs and Li Tianxuan people.　[Jiyun] Qu Yanqie, sound pious. Lili, the county name. [Pre-Han Geography] Lilu County, Zhangye County. [Note] Li Qi said: Yinchiqian.　[Tang Yun] bitter cut [Ji Yun] market cut,? Yin Kan. [Jade articles] Sheng Shiqi, wearing bow clothes.　[Jiyun] Hou Jiqie, Yinhan. Horse quilt.
